root.name: Llamatron: 2112
root.description: OverviewThe game features 100 levels, and loops back to the first level once completed. Individually, the game's toughest regular enemy was a marauding Mandlebrot Set.GameplayLlamatron allowed for simultaneous two-player, which could either be co-operative or competitive for score.Control could either be with two joysticks, for traditional twin-stick, or with one joystick. In this option holding fire locked the direction of fire to the current direction, allowing the player to move in one direction, while shooting in another.
